column5: Strange...I posted my boat for sale on Kijiji---and have 2 separate inquiries about selling just my motor---one guy from London--long ways away  I'm thinkin can't be too many used ones around  Weird
Have you ever looked into buying a new outboard motor? Many people are shocked when they see the price tag on a brand new one.
Yep, a new 40hp yammy is pushing 8K......I bought mine for just under 4K brand new in '94. I cant find a replacement now...unless I go new.  S.
Yeah likely why buddy can't seem to buy it fast enough  and cleaner now than it's been in years---is'nt that how sellin works
Big tillers have always been hard to find.  Costs are huge now too, as mentioned!  That's a nice looking boat!
they have risen a lot recently as well.  i only paid 8k for my 50 hp yammy tiller with the trolling control buttons, taxes in, in 2009.  now that motor is close to $10k.  25% increase in five years?

I think I paid 6500 for the motor alone back in 96  Yeah she was a great boat and buddy's gettin a deal-----it runs great---deep v hull---just downsizin (stems from downsizin my vehicle---which stems from the current cost of fuel)
A 50hp 4 stroke merc tiller with upgraded tiller arm is $9500-$10000...  Used ones sell like hot cakes
Yeah I'm seein that from my kijiji responses
Any used motor is hard to get, I am looking at re-powering my boat from a 115-150 and its crazy how much they are!!!
A 50hp 4 stroke merc tiller with upgraded tiller arm is $9500-$10000...  Used ones sell like hot cakes You can get anchors much cheaper than that at Princess Auto..

Any used motor is hard to get, I am looking at re-powering my boat from a 115-150 and its crazy how much they are!!!  I upgraded from a 90 two stroke to a 115 four stroke last year and it lightened my wallet by $14.5K!!!! The whole boat/motor/TM/trailer combo was $19.5K when I bought it new in '91.
Lmao  I went Yamaha out of NY state for $7200 for a 50hp 4 stroke with tank and prop...  Gotta shop around and explore your options...
My Merc has served me very well

Buddy bought a used 115 Merc E Tec last year for 12K and thought it was a great deal. I paid a tad more for a like new 14 year old 115 Merc 5 years ago and they threw in a 19' Starcraft and the trailer for free. Considering I stopped to pick up a few things at the store today and didn't even get a cart and it came to 73 bucks, no one shopping for toys can complain. I don't know how 2 working people with a few kids can even think about fishing today. Sad.
My Merc has served me very well ..as long as it holds tight and you don't start drifting...
And yet another person e-mailing me this morn looking to buy just my motor--gonna have to get it off kijiji I guess once buddy put cash in my mitt

I had this exact motor up till this year and it was great. Got an amazing trade in toward a new engine. Believe these were actually yamaha powerheads on these.  Have you got a new boat yet? Might be worth seeing what trade you could get at a dealer as the tillers are in demand?
Yes I'm told they were Yamaha powerheads
thanks good to know i am putting up my 18 alaskan up with a 50 honda tiller and this thread just put the price up
that new floor you put in your boat dave is sweet!  I'm sure you'll get good dollars for your boat.
